articles.title: Mistral AI inks a deal with global consulting giant Accenture
articles.description: Mistral AI lands a partnership with Accenture, the consultant that has also recently announced partnerships with rivals OpenAI and Anthropic.
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak

articles.title: So, we're getting Prada Meta AI glasses, right?
articles.description: Mark Zuckerberg was at Prada's fashion week event in Milan, leaving everyone to wonder if we're getting Meta AI glasses under the Prada brand.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Read AI launches an email-based ‘digital twin' to help you with schedules and answers
articles.description: Read AI is launching Ada, which can reply with your availability and extract answers from the company knowledge base and the web.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Anthropic CEO stands firm as Pentagon deadline looms
articles.description: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei said Thursday that he "cannot in good conscience accede" to the Pentagon's demands to give the military unrestricted access to its AI systems.
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Google paid startup Form Energy $1B for its massive 100-hour battery
articles.description: The deal paves the way for Form Energy to raise a new funding round before potentially going public next year.
articles.author: Tim De Chant

articles.title: Bumble adds AI-powered photo feedback and profile guidance tools
articles.description: Bumble and other popular dating apps, like Match Group's Tinder and Hinge, have all embraced AI-powered features.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Google launches Nano Banana 2 model with faster image generation
articles.description: Google is making Nano Banana 2 a default model in Gemini app and in AI mode.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Jack Dorsey just halved the size of Block's employee base — and he says your company is next
articles.description: Jack Dorsey has long been an open admirer of Elon Musk. Now, it seems, he may have been taking notes.
articles.author: Connie Loizos

articles.title: Sophia Space raises $10M seed to demo novel space computers
articles.description: The company's modular computer tiles offer a new vision for space data centers.
articles.author: Tim Fernholz

articles.title: Self-driving truck startup Einride raises $113M PIPE ahead of public debut
articles.description: The proceeds will support Einride’s technology roadmap, global expansion, and autonomous deployments in North America, Europe, and the Middle East.
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan
